## DragTarget.getClientRect() method

Returns the bounding rectangle of the drag target area in pixel units relative to the Blockly injection div.  The component's bounding box. Null if drag target area should be ignored.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getClientRect(): Rect | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Rect \| null
